verses.verse: The heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1>' households of the family <WH4940> of the children <WH1121> of Gilead, <WH1568> the son <WH1121> of Machir, <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> of the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Joseph, <WH3130> came near, <WH7126> and spoke <WH1696> before <WH6440> Moses, <WH4872> and before <WH6440> the princes, <WH5387> the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1>' households of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478>

and they said, <WH559> "Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> my lord <WH3068> to give <WH5414> the land <WH776> for inheritance <WH5159> by lot <WH1486> to the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> and my lord <WH113> was commanded <WH6680> by Yahweh <WH113> to give <WH5414> the inheritance <WH5159> of Zelophehad <WH6765> our brother <WH251> to his daughters. <WH1323>

If they are married <WH802> to any <WH259> of the sons <WH1121> of the other tribes <WH7626> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> then will their inheritance <WH5159> be taken <WH1639> away from the inheritance <WH5159> of our fathers, <WH1> and will be added <WH3254> to the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> whereunto they shall belong: <WH1639> so will it be taken away from the lot <WH1486> of our inheritance. <WH5159>

When the jubilee <WH3104> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall be, <WH5159> then will their inheritance be added <WH3254> to the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> whereunto they shall belong: <WH5159> so will their inheritance be taken away <WH1639> from the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of our fathers. <WH1>"

Moses <WH4872> commanded <WH6680> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> according to the word <WH6310> of Yahweh, <WH3068> saying, <WH559> "The tribe <WH4294> of the sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> speaks right. <WH1696>

This is the thing <WH1697> which Yahweh <WH3068> does command <WH6680> concerning the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad, <WH6765> saying, <WH559> Let them be married <WH802> to whom they think <WH5869> best; <WH2896> only into the family <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of their father <WH1> shall they be married. <WH802>

So shall no inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> remove <WH5437> from tribe <WH4294> to tribe; <WH4294> for the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall all <WH376> keep <WH1692> the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of his fathers. <WH1>

Every daughter <WH1323> who possesses <WH3423> an inheritance <WH5159> in any tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall be wife <WH802> to one <WH259> of the family <WH4940> of the tribe <WH4294> of her father, <WH1> that the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> may possess <WH3423> every man <WH376> the inheritance <WH5159> of his fathers. <WH1>

So shall no inheritance <WH5159> remove <WH5437> from one tribe <WH4294> to another <WH312> tribe; <WH4294> for the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> shall each <WH376> keep <WH1692> his own inheritance. <WH5159>"
The daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad <WH6765> did <WH6213> as Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> Moses: <WH4872>

for Mahlah, <WH4244> Tirzah, <WH8656> and Hoglah, <WH2295> and Milcah, <WH4435> and Noah, <WH5270> the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad, <WH6765> were married <WH802> to their father <WH1730>'s brothers <WH1121>' sons.

They were married <WH802> into the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> the son <WH1121> of Joseph; <WH3130> and their inheritance <WH5159> remained in the tribe <WH4294> of the family <WH4940> of their father. <WH1>

These are the commandments <WH4687> and the ordinances <WH4941> which Yahweh <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> by <WH3027> Moses <WH4872> to the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by the Jordan <WH3383> at Jericho. <WH3405>
